SA01asabhs_u:579: yatra saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ vayat saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate vā yaśca saṃkleśayati vyavadāyayati vā yā ca tatrāvasthā yā ca vyavadānatā tadāśrayeṇa sarvaṃ jñeyam //

SA01asabhs_u:614: kathaṃ sapratighaṃ kati sapratighāni kimarthaṃ sapratigha parīkṣā /

SA01asabhs_u:1136: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśa saṃgraho veditavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1138: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1139: itaretarasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ rūpaskandhasaṃgrahe kati dhātavaḥ katyāyatanāni /
SA01asabhs_u:1163: tadvat tadanye dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanairnirdṛśyante anye ca na skandhadhātvāyatanairnirddiśyante /
SA01asabhs_u:1164: yathā dravyamantaḥ prajñāptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamanto jñeyā vijñeyā abhijñeyā rūpiṇo 'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādayaḥ pūrvaṃ nirdṛṣṭāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1169: yathā yathā ālambaneṣu cittābhisaṃkṣepaḥ tathā tathā kuśalamūlābhivṛddhiḥ // 0 //
SA01asabhs_u:1173: avinirbhāga saṃprayogaḥ miśrībhāva saṃprayogaḥ samavadhānasaṃprayogaḥ sahabhāvasaṃprayogaḥ kṛtyānuṣṭhānasaṃprayogaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1177: (Abhidh-s 34) paramāṇorūrdhvaṃ sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ rūpāṃśikānāṃ parasparaṃ miśrībhāvaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1181: ekasmin kāye skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sahakālapravṛttiḥ samamutpatti sthitinirodhāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1193: api khalu kliṣṭasarvatragaḥ saṃprayogo manasi caturṇṇāṃ kleśānām //
SA01asabhs_u:1194: kādācitkaḥ saṃprayogastadyathā citte śraddhādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ ca kleśopakleśānām //
SA01asabhs_u:1199: bahirmukhaḥ saṃprayogo yadbhūyasā kāma pratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittacaitasikānām //
SA01asabhs_u:1201: ucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ pārthagjanikānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇām //
SA01asabhs_u:1202: anucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ lokottarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāmādyataduttarāṇāṃ lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhānāṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1204: cittamātre vedanādīnāṃ sāṃkleśikānāṃvyāvadānikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ saṃprayogaṃ jānāti /
SA01asabhs_u:1205: tacca jānanātmā vedayate saṃjānāti cetayate smarati saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate cetayatya bhiniveśaṃ prajahāti nairātmyamavatarati //
SA01asabhs_u:1213: kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktaiśca kleśopakleśairvījasamancāgamena samancāgataḥ upapattiprātilābhikaiśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1215: rūpadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ klaiśopakleśaiḥ vījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1220: traidhātu kapratipakṣa lābhī yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpannastasya bījasamanvāgamenāsamanvāgataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1223: prayogikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vaśitāsamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ vā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyādīnāṃ tadekatyājāṃ(cā)
SA01asabhs_u:1226: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ yo ya eva dharmaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kuśalo vā akuśalo vā avyākṛto vā tasya samudācārasamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1227: samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1232: tathā ācayāpacayajño na kasyāṃ cillaukikyāṃ saṃpattau vipattau vā ekāntikasaṃjñī bhavati yāvadevānunayapratighaprahāṇāya //
SA01asabhs_u:1243: narakasattvajanmatiryakpreteṣu manuṣyeṣu pūrvavideheṣvapagodānīyeṣu jāmbūdvīpeṣu uttareṣu kuruṣu deveṣu caturmā(hā)
SA01asabhs_u:1244: rājakāyikeṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu brahmapurohiteṣu mahābrāhmeṣuparīttābheṣva (pramāṇābheṣu ābhāsvareṣu parīttaśubheṣva)
SA01asabhs_u:1250_0: pṛthivīmaṇḍale sumeruḥ saptakāñcanaparvatāḥ catvāro dvīpāḥ aṣṭāvantaradvīpāḥ abhyantaraḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1250_2: sthānāntarāṇi cakracāḍaḥ parvataḥ ākāśe vimānāni yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1250_3: paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ devānāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca asurāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi nārakāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi /
SA01asabhs_u:1251_0: uṣṇanarakāḥśītanarakāḥ pratyekanarakāśca tadekatyānāṃ ca tiryakpretānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi
SA01asabhs_u:1251_1: yāvadādityāḥ paricaranto diśo 'vabhāsayante vairocanāstāvatsāhasrake loke sahasraṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1251_2: candrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryaṇāṃ sahasraṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarājāṇāṃ sahasraṃ caturṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1251_3: sahasraṃ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sahasraṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sahasraṃ yāmānāṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1251_4: sahasraṃ tuṣitānāṃ sahasraṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ sahasraṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ sahasraṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1255: evaṃ sa trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ mahācakravāḍa parvatamaṇḍala pariveṣṭitaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1257: tathā ca devaḥ cakrākārān vṛṣṭivindūn nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mākāśād varṣati /
SA01asabhs_u:1258: tathā ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mapramāṇo lokadhātuḥ saṃvarttiṣyate vā vivarttiṣyate vā saṃvarttate vā saṃvṛttastiṣṭhati vā vivarttate vā vivṛttastiṣṭhati vā /
SA01asabhs_u:1259: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi tathā sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:1260: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśaḥ janitaḥ karmakleśādhipateyaśca sarvamucyate duḥkhasatyam /
SA01asabhs_u:1261: pariśuddhalokadhātustu na duḥkhasatyasaṃgṛhīḥto na karmakleśa janitaḥ na karmakleśādhipateyaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1262: kevalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānena vyavadānakuśalamūlādhipatinā ākṛṣyate tadutpattisthānaṃ cācintyaṃ kevalaṃ buddhena budhyate na dhyāyināṃ dhyānagocaraḥ kiṃ punaḥ cintayatām //
SA01asabhs_u:1264_0: “jātirduḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1264_1: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham” //
SA01asabhs_u:1282: saṃvādhaduḥkhaṃ vipariṇati duḥkhaṃ saṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ viprayogaduḥkhaṃ kāmyaphalābhāvaduḥkhaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1287: tatra kathaṃ tisṛṣu saṃgṛhītānyaṣṭau aṣṭasu vā saṃgṛhītāstisraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1289: jātirdukhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhamiti santānaduḥkhaduḥkhatā /
SA01asabhs_u:1290: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ tadvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
SA01asabhs_u:1293: tat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ paramārthasatyena duḥkhaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1294: katamat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ katamat paramārthasatyena duḥkham /
SA01asabhs_u:1295: jātirduḥkhaṃ yāvat yadapīcchann labhate tadapi duḥkhamiti saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkham /
SA01asabhs_u:1296: yaduktaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paramārthasatyena duḥkham //
SA01asabhs_u:1301_1: kṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ prabandhalakṣaṇaṃ vyādhyādi lakṣaṇaṃ cittacittākāravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ bhogasaṃpattirvipatti
SA01asabhs_u:1325: kadācit sārāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati kadācid vītarāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:1326_0: yadvat sadveṣaṃ vā vītadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkṣiptaṃ vā vihisāṃ vā
SA01asabhs_u:1326_1: nimnaṃ vā unnataṃ vā uddhataṃ vā anuddhataṃ vā upaśāntaṃ vā anupaśāntaṃ vā samāhita vā asamāhitaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:1332: tisṛṇāṃ saṃvarttarnānāṃ śīrṣāṇi dvitīya tṛtīya caturthadhyānāni /
SA01asabhs_u:1333: caturthadhyāne vāhyānāṃ vimānānāṃ tu vāhyābhāvat eva saṃvarttavivarttaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1334: kevalaṃ tairdevaiḥ tāni vimānāni saha nirvarttante saha nirudhyante etaducyate saṃvartta vivarttaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1347: sattvā āyuḥkṣayād vā puṇya kṣayād vā karmakṣayād vā tasmādadhiṣṭhānāt cyavante iti /
SA01asabhs_u:1357: tisro duḥkhatāḥ aṣṭākā vā duḥkhaṃ ṣaḍākāraṃ vā (Abhidh-s 40)
SA01asabhs_u:1358: duḥkhaṃ bāhulyena pūrvamuktaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ nāma /
SA01asabhs_u:1359: kiṃ pratītyasūtre uktaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
SA01asabhs_u:1364: tathā ca saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mayā yatkiṃcid veditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti //
SA01asabhs_u:1365: api khalu utpādavyayadharmadvayānugateṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādayo 'ṣṭau duḥkhāni /
SA01asabhs_u:1366: prajñāyante ityabhisaṃdhāya buddhena bhāṣitaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
SA01asabhs_u:1367: api ca anityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ prajñāyate iti anityato duḥkhaṃ na sarve saṃskārā ityatrādhisandhirveditavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1380: tacca ātmano nāstitā anātmano 'stitā satī śūnyatā //
SA01asabhs_u:1392: etadabhisaṃghāyoktaṃ bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti //
SA01asabhs_u:1393: api coktaṃ bhagavatā naitat sarvaṃ mama naiṣo 'hamasmi na me sa ātmā iti /
SA01asabhs_u:1394: evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajñāya draṣṭhavyam iti tasya ko 'rtha uktaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1403: yathā cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatā tathā rūpādīnāmapi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā /
SA01asabhs_u:1404: cittopāttatāmupādāya cittaikayogakṣematāmupādāya cittavikāratadvikāratāmupādāya cittāśrayatāmudāpādāya cittādhipatyasaṃbhūtatāmupādāya cittvaśavarttināṃ copādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:1405: api khalu atyantavikāropālabdhitāmupādāya utpannasya cānapekṣya pratyayaṃ svarasavināśitāmupādāya rūpasyāpi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā //
SA01asabhs_u:1406: yaduktaṃ yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvantaccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāyeti /
SA01asabhs_u:1410: yatra punaḥ samudāye yadbhūtamupalabhyate tattatrā stiti vaktavya /
SA01asabhs_u:1413: upādāyarūpe 'pi yadupādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāya upalabhyate tattatrāstīti veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:1414: yatpunarūcyate paramāṇusaṃcitto rūpa samudāya iti tatra niḥśarīraḥ (Abhidh-s 42)
SA01asabhs_u:1416: buddhyā paryantaprabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāvibhāghanatāmupādāya rūpe dravyāḥ pariniṣpattipraveśatāṃ copādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:1417: tat punaretad duḥkhamasti vipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitā saṃlikhitaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1418: asti madhyamasaṃlikhitam asti tanukamasaṃlikhitam asti tanuttaraṃ saṃlikhitam asti tanutamaṃ saṃlikhitam astyaduḥkhaṃ duḥkhapratibhāsaṃ mahāsaṃlekhapratyupasthānaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1440: paṭuka eva cittaprakāre svākuśalamulabalādhā nato vā paropasaṃhārato vā akuśalacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:1441: paṭuke vā cittaprakāre apaṭuke vā tadubhayavai kalyādabhisaṃskārāsamarthasya vā avyākṛtacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:1445: tadyathā kṛṣṇasya kutapasya nirbhāso 'ndhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1446: aśubhakāriṇastadyathā śuklasya parasya nirbhāsajyotsnāyā vā rātryāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1455: upapattyāyatane tulāvanāmonnāmayogena cyavate pratisandhi ca vadhnāti /
SA01asabhs_u:1459: sa ca vipākastata ūrdhvamindriyābhinrivṛttiḥ yathā pratityasamutpāde catṛsṛṣvāyoniṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:1465: bhagavatā tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī samudayasatyanirdeśena nirdiṣṭā //
SA01asabhs_u:1469: tatha hi tṛṣṇā vastusarvatragā avasthāsarvatragā adhvasarvatragā dhātusarvatragā eṣaṇā sarvatragā prakārasarvatragā ca keśaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1470: parisaṃkhyānato 'pi lakṣaṇato 'pyutthāna to 'pyālambanato 'pi saṃprayogato 'pi paryāyato 'pi vipratipattito 'pi dhatuto 'pi nikāyato 'pi prahāṇato 'pi kleśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1475: ta eva dṛṣṭeḥ pañcākārjabhedena daśa bhavanti //
SA01asabhs_u:1477: yo dharma utpadyamāno 'praśāntalakṣaṇa utpadyamānena yena kāya cittaprabandhāpraśamapravṛttiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1480: kleśānuśayaścāprahīṇo bhavati kleśasthānīyaśca dharma ābhāsagato bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:1481: tatra ca ayoniśo manaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:1486: api khalu kāmāvacaraḥ kleśaḥ sthāpayitvā avidyā dṛṣṭi vicikitsāṃ ca tadanyaḥ urdhvabhūmyanālambanaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1500: pratigho rāgeṇa mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1501: mānaḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1507: dṛṣṭiḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1510: styānamauddhatyamāśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādaśca sarvatra kliṣṭe saṃprayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1513_0: saṃyojanaṃ bandhanaṃ anuśayaḥ upakleśaḥ paryavasthānam oghaḥ yogaḥ upādānam granthaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1513_1: nivaraṇam khilaḥ malaḥ nighaḥ śalyaḥ kiṃcanaḥ duścaritam āsravaḥ vighātaḥ paridāhaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1514: saṃyojanāni kati kathaṃ saṃyojanaṃ kutra saṃyojanam /
SA01asabhs_u:1516: anunayasaṃyojanam pratighasaṃyojanam mānasaṃyojanam avidyāsaṃyojanam dṛṣṭisaṃyojanam parāmarśasaṃyojanam vicikitsāsaṃyojanam īrṣyāsaṃyojanam mātsaryasaṃyojanaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1524: sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu na dharmeṣu cittasya vihiṃsā /
SA01asabhs_u:1535: sadṛśāt śreyānasmi śreyasā sadṛśo 'smīti vā yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1541: aprāpta uttare viśeṣā dhigame prāpto mayeti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1557: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāniḥsaraṇaṃ parikalpitavipratisāraṃ paryeṣane abhiniviśate /
SA01asabhs_u:1567: vicikitsāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu ratneṣu vicikitsate ratnatrayaṃ na samudāvarati /
SA01asabhs_u:1572: īrṣyāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto lābhasatkārān anunayati dharmaṃ na gurukaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:1577: mātsaryasaṃyojanena saṃprayukta upacayamanunayati ta dvarjanatāṃ ca na satkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:1585: apica rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalasamudācāreṣu na vaśavarttitāṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:1588: kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayaḥ bhavarāgānuśayaḥ mānānuśayaḥ avidyānuśayaḥ dṛṣṭayanuśayaḥ vicikitsānuśayaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1605: te sattvā hīnapratipakṣaṃ labhante mado mānaścotpadyate āryasatyeṣu saṃmohaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1606: mithyāmokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca saṃtorayanti buddhaśāsanadharmavinayeṣu vimatiḥ vicikitsā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1609: kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1611: ṣaḍrāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ krodhādikaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1612: api khalu rāgo dveṣo mohaśca caitasikā upakleśā ucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:1613: yaiścitte upakleśo na vairāgyaṃ na viumokṣo nāvaraṇaprahāṇam /
SA01asabhs_u:1615: tathā ca bhagavatoktam dīrgharātraṃ vo rāgadveṣamohā upakliśyantui vikṣipanti citraṃ saṃkliśyanti /
SA01asabhs_u:1618: punaḥ punaḥ udvegena cittaṃ paryayanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
SA01asabhs_u:1619: tathāca śamathapragrahanimittabhāvanākāle tatsanniśraya brahmacaryā diśuddhi saṃgṛhītaśīla kāle cittaṃ paryavanahyanti //
SA01asabhs_u:1645: ātmavādopādāne tu tīrthyā anyo 'nyaṃ na vivadanti /
SA01asabhs_u:1658: kāmacchandanivaraṇam vyāpādanivaraṇam styānamiddhanivaraṇam auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇam vicikitsānivaraṇaṃ ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1660: tacca pravrajyāyāmabhiratau codanāyāṃ pratipattau śamathe pragrahe upekṣāyāṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1664: cittasyādāntatayā akarmaṇyatayā durvimokṣatayā ca sattvaistasyāścaryāyā durbhedyatvāt khila ityucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1668: tat saṃprajānabdiḥ sabrahmacāribhirgrāme vā araṇye vā tathā kurvantaṃ paśyadbhirucyate ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmān karotyevaṃ kṛtyaṃ caratyevamācaritaṃ grāmakaṇṭaka āmiṣo 'śuciḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1672: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya dīrghakālaṃ punaḥ punarjātimaraṇeṣu vilaśyante ityucyante nighāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1675_0: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu vā adhyeṣaṇāsamutpādena prabandhānupacchedena
SA01asabhs_u:1675_1: buddhe dharme saṃghe duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgeṣu vā vicikitsāsamutpādena vā śalyā nāma //
SA01asabhs_u:1678: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya vittasaṃcayeṣu sabhayāḥ savairā bhūyo vihāravikṣepāḥ kiṃcanā nāma /
SA01asabhs_u:1699: abhāve vighāte sarvadā dāridya duḥkhādibhiḥ kliṣṭā bhavantīti vighātāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1703: tena nimittānuvyañjanābhiniveśena kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1710: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa śastrādānadaṇḍādibhiḥ raṇayanti nānāvidhaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalahaṃ kurvantīti rāgādayo raṇā ucyante //
SA01asabhs_u:1713: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa adharmarāgeṇa mahādahanena paridahanti viṣamalobhena mahādahanena paridahanti mithyādharmeṇa mahādahanena paridahantīti jvarā nāma //
SA01asabhs_u:1716: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa jātimaraṇamūleṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃyojayanti saṃjanayanti sattvān nānāvidhakāyeṣu pañcagatisaṃsāreṣu abhinirvarttayantīti rāgādayo vanasā ityucyante //
SA01asabhs_u:1719: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa kāyasāpekṣatā vittasāpekṣatā bodhyabhāvaḥ kolāhalaratiḥ parittakuśaladharmalābhe 'pi santoṣaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1723: rāgaḥ pratighaśca dvau kleśau viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipannau /
SA01asabhs_u:1729: daśa kleśā duḥkhe samudaye ca vipratipannāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1731: punaḥ daśa kleśā nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1736: api khalu rāgaḥ kāmadhātau sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhi saṃprayujyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1745: yathā mānastathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1763: api khalu rāgaḥ pratigho mānaśca kāmadhātau vastvekadeśapravṛttikāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1764: kāmadhātuvad rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātāvapi śiṣṭāḥ kleśāḥ sarvatra sarvavastu pravṛttikāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1774: rūpadhātau duḥkhādicaturvidhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ pratyekaṃ navakleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
SA01asabhs_u:1776: evaṃ ca darśanaprahātavyakleśanikāyā dvādaśādhikaṃ śataṃ kleśāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1778: sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antaprāhadṛṣṭiḥ rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1779: rūpadhātau bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ pañca kleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
SA01asabhs_u:1792: anutpannasyānutpādata utpannasya varjanato vā pratipakṣa lābhamārgaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:1795: asaṃbhinnālambanena manaskāreṇa sarvadharmā anātmāna iti paśyati /
SA01asabhs_u:1804: yathā yathā dauṣṭhulyamutpadyate tathā tathā pratipakṣa utpadyate yathā yathā pratipakṣa utpadyate tathā tathā dauṣṭhulyanirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1813: upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyavasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1819: tāni trīṇi kāyavāṅmanaskarmāṇi akuśalāni kuśalāni ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1821: prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānam kāmamithyācāraḥ mṛṣāvādaḥ piśunavāk paruṣavāk saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ abhidyā vyāpādaḥ mithyādṛṣṭiśca /
SA01asabhs_u:1824_0: prāṇātipātād viratiḥ adattādānādviratiḥ kāmamithyācārādviratiḥ mṛṣāvādādviratiḥ piśunavāco
SA01asabhs_u:1824_1: viratiḥ paruṣavāco viratiḥ saṃbhinnapralāpādviratiḥ anabhidhyā avyāpādaḥ samyagdṛṣṭiśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1828: katamāni cetanākarmāṇi parājñaptisaṃcetanīyatākarma paramasaṃjñaptisaṃcetatīyatākarma avijñāyasaṃcetanīyatākarma mūlābhiniveśasacetanīyatākarma viparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1829: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatākarma viparyāsaṃcetana yatā karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1830: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatā karmaviparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarmabhyāṃ yadi kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ ca na nāsya vipākaḥ pratisaṃvedyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1836: tanna daśānāmakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ triṣu apāyeṣu /
SA01asabhs_u:1839: adhipatiphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vipattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1841: daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ devamanuṣyamatiṣūpapadyamānānāṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vipākaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1842: niṣyandaphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇa ātmābhāvaparigrahayoḥ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:1843: adhipattiphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:1844: kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ sugatau durgatau ca vipāko 'bhinirvarttate /
SA01asabhs_u:1850: yena ekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhavanākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā anekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā //
SA01asabhs_u:1853: kāye yad audārikaṃ pūrvaṃ pacyate cyutikāle pratyupasthitaṃ vā pūrvaṃ bahulīkāratāṃ gataṃ vā atrasamācaritaṃ vā /
SA01asabhs_u:1855: yaduktaṃ sūtre trividhaṃ karma puṇyakarma apuṇya karma āniṃjyakarma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1862: yaduktaṃ sūtre avidyālambanāḥ saṃskārāḥ puṇyāniṃjyā apuṇyāniṃjyāśceti /
SA01asabhs_u:1880: yaduktaṃ sūtre sādhāraṇaṃ karma asādhāraṇaṃ karma valavatkarma durvalaṃ karma ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1889: yathā sattvānāmānyaiḥ sattvaiḥ saha anyonyaṃ darśanādikaṃ nopabhogo nopalabdhiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1894: prātipakṣikakarmabalavataḥ sarvaṃ saṃcetanīyaṃ kuśalaṃ karma balavadityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1895_0: tatkarma niśrityoktaṃ bhagavatā mamāryaśrāvakā apramāṇavaipulyakarmaṇi cittaṃ kuśalaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:1895_1: paribhāvayanti abhisaṃskṛte sapramāṇe karmaṇi nākṣipanti nāvasthāpayanti na parihāpayanti tatsaṃkhyāte /
SA01asabhs_u:1896: yadapi pratipakṣadurbalapugdalasya saṃcetanīyamakuśalaṃ karma tadapi kuśalātkarmaṇo (Abhidh-s 56)
SA01asabhs_u:1898: yat punaḥ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma niyatavipākamaprahīṇamaparijñātaṃ tad balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1899: tanmanasi nidhāyoktaṃ sarvaṃ ca kuśalākuśalaṃ karma niyatavipākamāryamārgeṇa prahīṇaṃ balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1900: yadapi kāmapratisaṃyuktamakuśalaṃ karma yadapi pūrvamabhyastaṃ yadapi padasthaṃ yadapyasādhyamabhisaṃskṛtaṃ karma aparinirvāṇadharmataḥ tadapi prakṛtyā balavat karma ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1903: tadyathā kṣetrataḥ vastutaḥ svabhāvataḥ āśrayataḥ manasikārataḥ āśayataḥ sahāyataḥ bahulīkārataḥ bāhujanyataśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1905_0: bhagavatoktaṃ ya evaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā
SA01asabhs_u:1905_1: vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso na bhavatyavakāśaśca na prajñāyate
SA01asabhs_u:1906_0: yastvevaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalo yathāvedanīyaṃ karma karotyupacinoti tathā
SA01asabhs_u:1906_1: tathā yathāvedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso bhavatyavakāśaśca
SA01asabhs_u:1908: tatra buddhā manasyevaṃ mithyāvacanaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāmayante /
SA01asabhs_u:1909_0: yat sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate duḥkhasahagatasya
SA01asabhs_u:1909_1: karmaṇo duḥkhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate aduḥkhāsukhasahagatasya karmaṇastatsahagata
SA01asabhs_u:1912: sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1913: duḥkhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1920: prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma anāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1923: bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇavasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerī saṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvaraḥ upāsikāsaṃvaraḥ upavāsasaṃvaraśca //
SA01asabhs_u:1941: dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ vījopaghāte sati kāmebhyo vītarāgasya yā viratiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:1951: abhijanmato vā tatkarmasamādānato vā tatkarmādhyācāraniścayaḥ asaṃvara ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1953_0: aurabhrikāḥ kaukkṛṭikāḥ śaukarikāḥ śākunikāḥ mātsyikāḥ lubdhakāḥ vāgurikāḥ corāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1953_1: ghātakāḥ govaṃdhakāḥ nāgavaṃdhakāḥ māṇḍalikāḥ nāgamaṇḍalikāḥ kārāgārikāḥ sūcakāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:1957: sukhavedanīyaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karma ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1959: kāmāvacarāt tṛtīyadhyānaṃ yāvad yat kuśalaṃ karma //
SA01asabhs_u:1965: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karma ca //
SA01asabhs_u:1967: tatkarma dṛṣṭe dharme yasya vipāko vipacyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1968: tacca maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasyaṃ parihāṇiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1969: yathā maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasya tathā araṇasamāpatteruccalitasya niurodhasamāpatteruccalitasya strotāpattiphalāduccalitasya arhattvaphalāduccalitasya ca /
SA01asabhs_u:1970: buddhapramukhe saṃghe kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1971: anyeṣāṃ tīvrāśayaprayogeṇa kuśalākuśalakarmapratipannānāmapi dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
SA01asabhs_u:1973: tatkarma anantare janmani yasya vipāko vipacyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1975: api ca yānyanyāni kuśalākuśalāni karmāṇi yeṣāmanantare janmani vipāko vipacyate tatsarvamucyate upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma //
SA01asabhs_u:1980: kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākaṃ karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ karma akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ karma //
SA01asabhs_u:1986: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ karma yat karma vā āśayataḥ prayogato vā śuklaṃ yat karma vā prayogataḥ kṛṣṇamāśayataḥ śuklam //
SA01asabhs_u:1988_0: prayogānantaryamārge 'nāsravaṃ karma aviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasyānāsravakarmaṇaḥ paripanthamānukūlyasvabhāvamadhikṛtya
SA01asabhs_u:1988_1: vaṃkadoṣakaṣāyāṇāṃ śauceyānāṃ mauneyānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:1991: nidānataḥ utthānataḥ pradeśataḥ svabhāvataśca dānakarma vikalpyate /
SA01asabhs_u:1998: api ca aniśritadānataḥ mahāśucidānataḥ parama prahṛṣṭadānataḥ abhikṣṇadānataḥ kṣetrabhājanadānataḥ navapurāṇasaṃvibhāgadānataśca dānasaṃpad veditavyā //
SA01asabhs_u:2000: anabhidutadeyavastutaḥ aparāpakṛtadeyavastutaḥ akuthitavimaladeyavastutaḥ śucideyavastutaḥ dharmārjitadeyavastutaśca deyasaṃpad veditavyā //
SA01asabhs_u:2002: tathācoktaṃ sūtre śīlasamanvāgataḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛta ācāragocarasaṃpanno 'ṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu mahābhayadarśī śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu iti //
SA01asabhs_u:2013: ataḥ paraṃ śīlamārabhya yad buddhena sūtreṣu nirdṛṣṭaṃ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavatītyevamādi //
SA01asabhs_u:2019: avipratisārādīnāṃ krameṇa saṃpratipattyā yāvat samādhilābhasanniśraya taḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2043: karmasvakā karmadāyādāḥ karmayonīyāḥ karmapratisaraṇāḥ karma sarvān sattvān vibhajati uccanīcatayā hīnapraṇītatayā (Abhidh-s 61) iti //
SA01asabhs_u:2053: yat karmaṇā sugatau durgatau vātmabhāvaprabhedaṃ labhante //
SA01asabhs_u:2059: akuśalasya karmaṇo hīnāsu tisṛṣu durgatiṣu aniṣṭavipākalābhaścintyaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2067: tadyathā āyurvaśitayā cittavaśitayā pariṣkāravaśitayā karmavaśitayā upapattivaśitayā adhimuktivaśitayā praṇidhānavaśitayā ṛddhivaśitayā jñānavaśitayā dharmavaśitayā /
SA01asabhs_u:2070: tathā ca samudayasatyaṃ samāsato lakṣaṇaprabhedena caturvidham /
SA01asabhs_u:2073: punarbhavavāsanāyā āhārakaṃ kāraṇaṃ heturiti hetulakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2075: teṣāṃ teṣāmupacitavāsanānāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye udayasya kāraṇamiti (Abhidh-s 62)
SA01asabhs_u:2078: pratyātmaṃ santānānāṃ sarvaprakāraprakarṣodbhavasya kāraṇamiti prabhavalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2083: lakṣaṇataḥ gāmbhīryataḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthataḥ aparipūritaḥ paripūritaḥ niralaṃkārataḥ sālaṃkārataḥ śeṣataḥ aśeṣataḥ agrataḥ paryāyataśca nirodhasatyaṃ veditavyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2085: tathatāyāmārya mārge kleśānāmanutpādo yo nirodhāśrayo nirodhako nirodhasvabhāvo vā //
SA01asabhs_u:2088: manaśca teṣu āyataneṣu nāmarūpayorātyantikanirodho na śeṣaḥ iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2089: yaccoktaṃ tadāyatanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā cakṣuśca nirudhyate rūpasaṃjñā ca virajyate yāvat manaśca nirudhyate dharmasaṃjñā ca virajyate iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2090: anena nayena ālambanānāṃ prāpaṇaṃ tathatāyāmālambanādūrdhvaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2094: tathoparamāt teṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodho nānyo vācyaḥ nānanyo vācyaḥ nāpyanyo nāpyananyo vācyaḥ na naivānyo nānanyo vācyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2097: asmiṃstvarthe prapañcotpattiḥ na saṃcintyā na mārgeṇa na nyāyena na kuśalaprayogeṇa cintyā iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2098: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ spraṣṭāvyayatanānāṃ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi /
SA01asabhs_u:2100: syānnaivānyo nānanyo 'pi iti niṣprapañca prapañca utpadyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2102: yadā ṣaḍāyatanānāṃ nirodhaśchedaḥ tadā prapañcānāṃ viratiḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2109: śaikṣāṇāṃ strotāpannaphalasaṃgraheṇa vā sakṛdāgamiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā anāgāmiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā yo nirodhaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2115: ubhayabhāga vimuktānāṃ traividyānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñānāmarhatāṃ yo nirodhaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2124: aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargaḥ vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi //
SA01asabhs_u:2172: kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punaḥ sauvarṇikamityucyate paramārthasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:2203: yena duḥkhaṃ parijānīte samudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA01asabhs_u:2208: pṛthagjanānāṃ śīlam indriyadvārarakṣā bhojane mātrājñatā prathamarātrau taduttararātriṣu vā nityamamiddhaṃ vīryabhāvanā śamathavipaśyanā saṃprajanyavihāraśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2209: yadvā punaranyadaupaniṣadaṃ kuśalam śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā bhāvanāmayī prajñā //
SA01asabhs_u:2214: saṃbhāramārgopacitāni nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni ūṣmagataḥ mūrdhānaḥ satyānukūlakṣānti laukikāgradharmaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2216: pratyātmaṃ satye pvālokalabdhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2225: samāsato laukikā gradharmānantaramanupalambhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2229_0: duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2229_1: samudaye dharmajñānaṃ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānaṃ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2229_2: nirodhe dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ nirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ
SA01asabhs_u:2238: pūrvādhipatibalavicāraṇāmupādāya pratyātmaṃ duḥkhasatye pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā /
SA01asabhs_u:2242: kṣāntyanantaraṃ yena jñānena pūrvoktebhyaḥ kleśebhyo vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:2245: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāne ca pratyātmaṃ pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā utpadyate yaduttaramanvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇām /
SA01asabhs_u:2256: api ca eṣu sarveṣu kṣāntijñāneṣu animittaprekṣāvihārī veditavyaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2263: tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena prāpaṇanimittapramāṇaiḥ nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ mārgasatyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2265: abhisamayaprayuktā laukikena jñānena yathāvyavasthānaṃ vikalpoyanto yadabhyasyanti //
SA01asabhs_u:2272: yaduktaṃ sūtre virajño vītamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūdapādi iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2274: tatra dharmakṣāntibhirvirajaḥ dharmajñānairvītamalam parijñayā prahāṇena mārgaśuddhilābhena ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2275_0: yaduktaṃ sūtre dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā sarvaiḥ tīrṇakāṃkṣaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2275_1: tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayaḥ śāstuḥ śāsano 'nanyaneyaḥ dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta
SA01asabhs_u:2282: aparapratyayaḥ mārgabhāvanāyāṃ na parataḥ svayaṃ kuśalāvarjanena /
SA01asabhs_u:2287: darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ laukiko mārgo lokottaramārgaḥ mṛdumārgo madhyamārgo 'dhimātro mārgaḥ prayogamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ vimuktimārgaḥ viśeṣamārgaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2289: laukikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamākāśānattyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanamākiñcatyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2297: tathā ca saṃkliṣṭacetasāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ kleśopakleśāḥ pravarttante //
SA01asabhs_u:2304: pañcāṅgāni vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2306: catvāryaṅgāni adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāpratā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2308: pañcāṅgāni upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2310: catvāryaṅgāni upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiḥ aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā cittaikāgratā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2311: pratipakṣāṅgamupādāya anuśaṃsāṅgamupādāya tadubhayāśrayasvabhāvāṅgaṃ copādāya ārupyeṣvaṅgavyavasthānaṃ nāsti /
SA01asabhs_u:2317: lakṣaṇaprati saṃvedī manaskāraḥ ādhimokṣikaḥ prāvivejaḥ ratisaṃgrāhakaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ prayoganiṣṭhaḥ prayoganiṣṭhāphalaśca (Abhidh-s 69)
SA01asabhs_u:2322: mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitasya prathamasya dhyānasya phalaṃ trividhā prathamā dhyānopapattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2323: yathā prathamasya dhyānasya evaṃ śiṣṭānāṃ dhyānānāṃ trividhā dhyānopapattiḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2328: teṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nāmābhijñā api na bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2331: prāntakoṭikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvannaiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ viśuddhirityucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2333: bhāvanāmārge duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni dharmajñānānvayapakṣyāṇi taiśca saṃprayuktaḥ samādhiḥ prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ yāvadākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ,
SA01asabhs_u:2336: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā yāvadeva saṃjñāsamāpattiḥ tāvadājñāprativedha iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2343: mṛdumṛdurmṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇā kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmāvadhimātrādhimātramadhimātramadhyamadhimātrāmṛduṃ kleśaprakāra prajahāti //
SA01asabhs_u:2345: madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau madhyādhimātraṃ madhyamadhyaṃ madhyamṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti //
SA01asabhs_u:2347: adhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau mṛdvadhimātraṃ mṛdumadhyaṃ mṛdumṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti //
SA01asabhs_u:2356: api khalu kleśaprahāṇaprayogaṃ nirākṛtya dharmacintāyāṃ vā prayuktasya dharmavihāre vā samāpattiviśeṣe vā yo mārgaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2357: api khalu vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharato vā yo mārgaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2363: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatāyai yā bhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:2365: utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya yā bhāvanā //
SA01asabhs_u:2368: api khalu mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāmava sthāpayati sā pratilambhabhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:2369: sa eva saṃmukhībhūto bhāvanāṃ gacchati sā niṣevaṇabhāvanā /
SA01asabhs_u:2372: api khalu caturvidhaḥ pratipakṣaḥ vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣaḥ dūrībhāvapratipakṣaśca pratipakṣabhāvanetyucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2381_0: api khalu vastuparīkṣāmārgaḥ vyāvasāyiko mārgaḥ samādhiparikarmamārgaḥ abhisamayaprāyogiko
SA01asabhs_u:2381_1: mārgaḥ abhisamayaśliṣṭo mārgaḥ abhisamayamārgaḥ viśuddhinairyāṇiko mārgaḥ niśrayendriyabhinno
SA01asabhs_u:2381_2: mārgaḥ śikṣātrayapariśodhano mārgaḥ sarvaguṇanirhārako mārgaḥ mārgasaṃgrahamārgaśca mārga ityucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2382: sa punareṣa yathākramaṃ saptatriṃśadabodhipakṣā dharmāḥ catasraḥ pratipadaḥ catvāri dharmapadāni śamatha(ai)
SA01asabhs_u:2384: smṛtyupasthānānāmālamvanaṃ svabhāvaḥ sahāyaḥ bhāvanā bhāvanāphalañca veditavyam /
SA01asabhs_u:2388: api khalvātmāśrayavastu ātmopabhogavastu ātmavastu ātmasaṃkleśavyavadānavastu ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2413: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā evaṃ vedanādiṣu vedanādyanupaśyanā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2414: api khalu bhāvanā chando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāhaḥ utsūḍhiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ apramādaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2433: taduktaṃ sūtre chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryamārabhate cittaṃ pragṛṇhāti cittaṃ pradadhāti /
SA01asabhs_u:2448: chandovīryaṃ cittaṃ mīmāṃsā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2457: punaḥ chandasamādhiḥ yat chandaṃ janayan spṛśati cittasyaikagratām //
SA01asabhs_u:2459: cittasamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pradadhat spṛśati cittasyaigratām //
SA01asabhs_u:2460: mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pragṛṇhan spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām //
SA01asabhs_u:2464: chandaḥ vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā praśrabdhiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ cetanā upekṣā ca /
SA01asabhs_u:2471: api ca teṣu teṣu dharmeṣu adhigamaḥ prātiḥ karmaṇyatā vaśitā kāritraṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nānāvidhānāmṛdudhyādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ niṣpādanamadhiguṇānāṃ nirhāraśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2476: śraddhā vīrya smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2492: smṛtiḥ dharmavicayaḥ vīryaṃ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ samādhiḥ upekṣā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2511: samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyakkarmmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2525: duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā //
SA01asabhs_u:2536: adhyātmaṃ cittasya upanibandhaḥ sthāpanā saṃsthāpanā avasthāpanā upasthāpanā damanaṃ śamanaṃ vyupaśamanam ekotīkaraṇaṃ samādhānaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2538: yā dharmān vicinoti pravivinoti parivitarkkayati parimīmāṃsamāpataye /
SA01asabhs_u:2539: ca kāma pratipakṣadauṣṭhulyanimittasaṃyojanataḥ kāmābhibhavānāṃ viparyāsataḥ aviparyastacittasyāvasthāpanataśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2545: ekatyaḥ na śamathasya lābhī nāpi vipaśyanāyāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2548: tasya śamathavipaśyanobhayamārga yuktasya samaṃ yugapat pravṛttiḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2557: prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakānyapi bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2559: yathā prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti tathā sarvepāmūrdvabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge adhobhūmikāni kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2564: tadanantaraṃ nirantarāśrayapravṛttiḥ prāptakṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ daśāśaikṣā dharmāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2566: aśaikṣasya samyagdṛṣṭiryāyada śaikṣasya samyaksamādhiḥ aśaikṣasya samyagvimokṣaḥ aśaikṣasya samyag jñānaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2576: bhāvanāmārgagatasya taduttaraṃ saṃyojanaprahāṇamārgavasthāyāṃ yaḥ samādhiḥ prayogamārgasaṃgraho vā ānantaryamārgasaṃgraho vā /
SA01asabhs_u:2577: prayogamārgasaṃgrahastu tataḥ paraṃ sarvairāvaraṇairacchādyaḥ sarvāvarāṇānāṃ ca bhedaka iti /
SA01asabhs_u:2579: sa ca samādhiḥ nirantaraḥ dṛḍhaḥ ekarasaḥ vyāpī ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2581: bhagavatoktaṃ tadyathā mahāśailaparvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekaghanaḥ susaṃvṛtto daśadigvātākampyaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2587: hetukṣayeṇa yad śānaṃ labhyate kṣayaviṣayā lambanaṃ vā //
SA01asabhs_u:2589: phalaprahāṇena yad jñānaṃ labhyate phalānutpattiviṣayālambanaṃ vā //
SA01asabhs_u:2590: daśāśaikṣā dharmāstu aśaikṣāṇāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2604: kena hetunā satyeṣu anityaduḥkhādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa lauaukikākārāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2607: lokottarākāreṣu varttamāno 'nityārthaṃ paśyati sākṣādanubhavati notvanityaṃ paśyati abhilāpaprapañcamukhena /
SA01asabhs_u:2608: yathā anityākārā anityārthe evaṃ śiṣṭhākarāḥ śiṣṭārtheṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2614: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ nidānam avadānam itivṛtakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyam adbhutadharmaḥ upadeśaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2617: daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyan tathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati sukhaṃ vyavasthāpayati sukhaṃ deśayati /
SA01asabhs_u:2618: śrotāpi sukhamudgṛṇhāti dharmagauravatayā kṣipraṃ bodhi saṃbhārān paripūrayati āśudharmatāṃ pratividhyati /
SA01asabhs_u:2619: buddhe 'vetyaprasādaṃ labhate dharme saṃghe cāvetya prasādaṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:2624: sūtrāṇāṃ madhye vā ante vā gāthayā yad gīyate /
SA01asabhs_u:2633: dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadī paṃcapadī ṣaṭpadī vā //
SA01asabhs_u:2660: evaṃ sūtrādīni dvādaśāṅgānyāryaśāsanāni triṣu piṭakeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2665: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ caitāni pañca śrāvakāṇāṃ piṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2666: nidānamavadānamitivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ caitāni catvāri dvayoḥ piṭakayoḥ saparivāre vinayapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2667: vaipulyamadbhutadharmaśca ete dve bodhisattvapiṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhīte bhavataḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2668: upadeśa ekaḥ śrāvakabodhisattvapiṭakayoḥ abhidharmapiṭake saṃgṛhīto bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:2679: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2681: yaduktaṃ sutre cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ sālambanāḥ sākāraḥ sāśrayāḥ sasaṃprayogāśca /
SA01asabhs_u:2704: catvāri āryasatyāni ṣoḍaśākārāḥ tathatā sarve anityāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve duḥkhā saṃskārāḥ sarve 'nātmāno dharmāḥ nirvāṇaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyamapraṇihitamanimittaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2708: ṣoḍaśākāreṣu śūnye kati ākārāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA01asabhs_u:2721: skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyuasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:2725: yat dharmā dharmānabhiniṣyandayanti nahyeṣāṃ nirhetuko nāpi viṣamahetuka utpāda itīdaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam /
SA01asabhs_u:2728: yad adhobhūmikānāmaudarikatā ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ śāntatā tathatā catvāryasatyāni ca /
SA01asabhs_u:2740: anādikālāt svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇasthitadharmeṣu yā dharmatāpariniṣpattiḥ sā dharmatā //
SA01asabhs_u:2757: nāmaparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ /
SA01asabhs_u:2770: saṃbhṛtabodhisaṃbhārasya ūṣmagatādiṣu āryasatyeṣu ca yad vāhuśrutyam //
SA01asabhs_u:2806: kena kāraṇena vaipulyaṃ audāryaṃ gāmbhīrya ca deśyate /
SA01asabhs_u:2813: kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyāḥ sattvā adhimucyante /
SA01asabhs_u:2816: idaṃ ca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye bodhisattvasya yathāruta mayoniśo dharmānvicinvataḥ aṣṭāviṃśatirasadṛṣṭaya utpadyante //
SA01asabhs_u:2818_1: pariṇatidṛṣṭiḥ anavadyatādṛṣṭiḥ niḥsaraṇadṛṣṭiḥ avajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiḥ viparītadṛṣṭiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2818_2: prasavadṛṣṭiḥ anabhyupagamadṛṣṭiḥ kusṛtidṛṣṭiḥ satkāradṛṣṭi dṛḍhamūḍhatādṛṣṭiḥ mūladṛṣṭiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2823: api khalu parikalpite svabhāve lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya paratantre utpattiniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya pariniṣpanne paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:2843: tatra pañcavidhāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvattirtamiti darśayati /
SA01asabhs_u:2844: pañcavidhā bhāvanā saṃbhinnabhāvanā animittabhāvanā anābhogabhāvanā uttaptabhāvanā parivṛttinibhaḥ(?)
SA01asabhs_u:2846: kena kāraṇena vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakadharmaḥ sarvasattvahitasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:2855: roga caritaprabhedataḥ niryāṇaprabhedataḥ ādhāraprabhedataḥ prayogaprabhedataḥ phalaprabhedataḥ dhātuprabhedataḥ caryāprabhedataśca //
SA01asabhs_u:2858: rāgacaritaḥ dveṣacarita mohacaritaḥ mānacaritaḥ vitarkacaritaḥ samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaska caritaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2869_0: śraddhādhimuktaḥ dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimuktaḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ strotāpattiphalapratipakṣakaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2869_2: arhattvaphalapratipannakaḥ arhan saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ kulaṃkulaḥ ekavīcikaḥ antarāparinirvāyī
SA01asabhs_u:2869_4: parihāṇadharmā arhan cetanādharmā arhan anurakṣaṇādharmā arhan sthitākampyaḥ arhan
SA01asabhs_u:2869_5: prativedhadharmā arhan akopyadharmā arhan ca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2873: kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaraśca bodhisattvaḥ kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ acintyaśca tathāgataḥ pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2876: adhimukticārī bodhisattvaḥ adhyāśayacārī bodhisattvaḥ nimittacārī bodhisattvaḥ animittacāri bodhisattvaḥ anabhisaṃskāracārī bodhisattvaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2879: evaṃ dveṣacarito mohacarito mānacarito vitarkacaritaśca pudgalaḥ tīvrāyataviśiṣṭaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2886_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā śrāvakadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyaḥ svavimuktaye
SA01asabhs_u:2888_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā pratyekabuddhadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā madhyendriyaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2888_1: svavimuktaye praṇihitaḥ vairāgyabhāvanayā vimuktāśayaḥ kevalabhāvanayā cādhigatavodhyāśayaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:2888_4: ārya mārgasaṃmukhībhūtaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ ekavihārī pratyekajinaḥ varggacāri duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2890_0: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā bodhisattvadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sarvasattvavimokṣāya
SA01asabhs_u:2890_2: sattvān paripācayati śuddhāṃ buddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratilabhate samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca sākṣātkaroti //
SA01asabhs_u:2892: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya mṛdumātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ mṛdumātrāmokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ aniyatajanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2894: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya madhyamātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ madhyamātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgato niyatajanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2898: punaḥ asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu mṛdumātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgato mṛdumātra nirvedhabhāgīyasanvāgata anivatajanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2899: saṃbhṛtāsaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu madhyamātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ madhyamātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgato nithatajanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2900: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu adhimātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ adhimātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ tajjanmakālikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2901: tatra trimātranirvedhabhāgīyo laukikāgradharmaṃ sthāpayitvā laukikāgradharmaprakṛtyaiva kṣaṇikaḥ aprāvandhikaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2905: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro mṛdvindriyaḥ paropadeśamanusmṛtya yaḥ satyābhisamayāya prayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2907: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārastīkṣṇendriyaḥ svayameva satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamanusmṛtya yaḥ [satyābhi]samayāya prayujyate //
SA01asabhs_u:2929: yadā darśana prahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt [stota ā]panno bhavati //
SA01asabhs_u:2930: kena kāraṇena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt strotaāpanno bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:2937: api khalu jñeyavipra[tipatti]kāraṇatāmupādāya dṛṣṭivipratipattikāraṇatāmupādāya pratipakṣavipratipattikāraṇatāṃ copādāya //
SA01asabhs_u:2939: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ pañcaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2941: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarasya ṣaṣṭhasya kleśaprakā[rasya pra] hāṇamārge yaḥ pugdalaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2943: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ saptamāṣṭamānāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2945: bhāvanāmarge kāmāvacarasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2946: yadā sarveṣāṃ kāmāvacarā[ṇāṃ bhāva]nāprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmī bhavati //
SA01asabhs_u:2954: bhāvāmrikasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2955: yadā traidhātukānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarvvakleśānāṃ prahāṇādarhan bhavati //
SA01asabhs_u:2962: strotaāpanna eva pudgalaḥ saptakṛtvo 'pi miśromiśra devamanuṣyeṣu bhavāt saṃsṛtya yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2964: deveṣu vā kulātkulaṃ gatvā [manuṣye]ṣu vā yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2968_1: yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti abhinivṛtto vā antarābhave upapattibhavagamanāya
SA01asabhs_u:2969: abhisaṃcetayitvā vā upapattibhavamabhisaṃprasthitaḥ [bhavānu]papatticchandaṃ yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2971: ubhayasaṃyojane aprahīṇe rūpadhātāvupapannamātra eva yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2973: upapannaḥ anabhisaṃskāreṇa yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
SA01asabhs_u:2977: upapanno rūpāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvadakaniṣṭhagān praviśya tannānāsrava mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:2978: puna kaścid yāvad bhavāgragān mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
SA01asabhs_u:2979: api ca vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya pañcaprakārā prabhedāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:2981: taiḥ vyavakīrṇābhāvitasya caturthadhyānasya pañcaprabhedaiḥ yathākramaṃ paścasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattiḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:2983: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā cetayitvā vā acetayitvā vā dṛṣṭadharmasukha vihārāt parihāṇameti //
SA01asabhs_u:2985: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā acetayitvā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti cetayitvā na parihāṇameti //
SA01asabhs_u:2990: mṛdvindriya prakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt na parihāṇameti nāpi indriyāṇyuttāpayati //
SA01asabhs_u:2992: mṛdvindriyāprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhaviharāt na parihāṇameti kevala mindriyā ṇyuttāpayati //
SA01asabhs_u:2994: tīkṣṇendriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto va avikṣipto vā na dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti //
SA01asabhs_u:2998: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati adharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3001: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati āryadharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3003: yathā kāmāvacarāstrayaḥ tathā rūpāvacarā ārupyavacarā api //
SA01asabhs_u:3005: ārūpyadhātuvyavakarṣitena dhyānena saṃprayukto dhyānasukhairviharatīti kāmadhātāvapyupapanno rūpadhātāvapyupapannaḥ pudgala kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3008: kāmadhātau tuṣitabhavanayāsamārabhya yāvat mahāparinirvāṇaṃ darśayati sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ buddhacaryāṃ mahācaryāṃ darśayatīti pudgalaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3018: acalā sādhumatīdharmameghāsu bhūmiṣu sthito yo bodhisattvaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3019: punaḥ khalu strotaāpannaḥ pugdalo yaduktaḥ sa dvividhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3022: sakṛnnairyāṇikaḥ satyābhisamayamabhisaṃpraviṣṭaḥ aprāpta samāpattimāśritya adhigatena lokottaramāgreṇa sakṛta traidhātukāvacarān sarvakleśān prajahāti prakāraśaḥ prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:3024: sa ca pudgalo bhūyo dṛṣṭe dharme maraṇakāle ājñāmārāgayati /
SA01asabhs_u:3031: arthābhisamayaḥ tattvābhisamayaḥ pṛṣṭhābhisamayaḥ ratnābhisamayaḥ asamudācārābhisamayaḥ niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ śrāvakābhisamayaḥ pratyekabuddhābhisamayaḥ bodhisattvābhisamayaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3033: satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrasya adhimuktiprasādasya pratilambhaḥ yathāsaṃpratyayaṃ caryā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3034: arthābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrāyāḥ satyeṣu dhamanidhyānakṣānteḥ pratilambhaḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3041: bhāvanāmārge tatsaṃvṛtijñānāni pratilabhate na tu saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:3046: buddhe 'vetya prasādaḥ dharme 'tya prasādaḥ saṃghe 'vetya prasādaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3048: akāraṇasaṃvaralābhāt śikṣāgatasya yadātmano narakakṣayaṃ tiryagyonikṣayaḥ pretayonikṣayaḥ avāṅpatanadurgatikṣayaḥ iti /
SA01asabhs_u:3054: śrāvakāṇāṃ parato ghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:3060: pūrvokteṣu saptābhisamayeṣu yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ no tu sakṣātkiryā /
SA01asabhs_u:3065_1: parigrahaviśeṣaḥ vyavasthānaviśeṣaḥ pratiṣṭhāparivāraviśeṣaḥ abhijanmaviśeṣaḥ janmaviśeṣaḥ phalaviśeṣaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:3071_0: apramāṇāni vimokṣāḥ abhibhvāyatanāni kṛtsāyatanāni araṇāpraṇīdhijñānam pratisaṃvidaḥ
SA01asabhs_u:3071_1: abhijñā lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni pariśuddhayaḥ valāni vaiśāradyāni smṛtyupasthānāni arakṣāṇi
SA01asabhs_u:3071_2: asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamuddhātaḥ mahākaruṇā āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā
SA01asabhs_u:3075: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena saṃprayujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3077: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā duḥkhena viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3079: (Abhidh-s 95) dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena na viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3081: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā hita labheranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3085_0: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā avibhāvānād draṣṭarī rūpasaṃjñāyāḥ
SA01asabhs_u:3085_1: saṃniveśanād vā dṛśya rūpādi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddho samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca
SA01asabhs_u:3087: dhyānaṃ niśritya draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā vibhāvanād arūpasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃniveśanādvā dṛśya rūpāṇi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddhau samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3088: kathaṃ śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti /
SA01asabhs_u:3089_0: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣu anyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāyā anyonyānugamasaṃjñāyā
SA01asabhs_u:3089_1: anyonyaikarasasaṃjñāyāśca labhāt tatra labdhe vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ
SA01asabhs_u:3091: vimokṣānukūlā kāśānantyāyatanavimokṣaḥ tathā vijñānānantyāyatanākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanavimokṣā api draṣṭavyaḥ yāvat vimokṣaḥ śānto vimokṣaḥ asaktyāvaraṇaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3093_0: naivasaṃjñānasaṃjñāyatanavimokṣaṃ niśritya samatikrāntānāṃ śiṣṭe śānte vimokṣe mokṣānusadṛśo
SA01asabhs_u:3093_1: vihāraḥ vihārasamṛddhau ca cittacaitasikānāṃ nirodhaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhāvaraṇād vimuktyartham //
SA01asabhs_u:3097: pūrvāṇī catvāri abhibhvāyatanāni dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ vyavasthāpyante /
SA01asabhs_u:3098: uttarāṇi catvāri abhibhvāvatanāni ekena vimokṣeṇa vyavasthāpyante /
SA01asabhs_u:3109: kṛtsnaspharaṇavihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ kṛtsnāyatanānītyucyante //
SA01asabhs_u:3115: dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3117: dhyānaṃ niśritya jñeya jñānapraṇidhisamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3121: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvadharma paryāyeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhīḥ prajñāśeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3126: dhyānaṃ niśritya janapadabhāpāyāmanuvyavahāre dharmanirvacane ca avyāghāta samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3128: dhyānaṃ niśritya dharmaprabhedeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3132: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrarddhivikurvita samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3134: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrāṇāṃ śabdānāmanuśravasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3136: dhyānaṃ niśritya parasattveṣu cittacaritaparyāya praveśasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3138: dhyānaṃ niśritya pūrvāntacaryānusmaraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3140: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvānāṃ cyutyupapādaprakāra saṃdarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3142: dhyānaṃ niśritya āsravakṣayajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3144: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairvibhrājamānasandarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayūktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ tatsamutthitavipākāśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3148: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamaśrayasyopādāne sthānaparityāgānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhīḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3150: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamālambananirmāṇapariṇāmanajñānānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3152: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ samādhimukhavaśavarttisamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3154: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ dhāraṇīmukhasandhāraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3158: sthānāsthānabalaṃ katamat dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra sthānāsthānajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3160: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra karmasvakajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3165: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārajñeyābhisaṃbodhipratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3167: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārasravakṣayapratijñā pratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3169: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākārāntarāyikadharmapratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3171: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākāra nairyāṇikamārgadharma pratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3174: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe sarvākārasaṃkleśāsamudācārasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ purvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3177: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe yathākāmamavavādānuśāsanīprayogasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3179: sarvākārasya yathāvat kṛtassa bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3181: sarvajñasya sataḥ asarvajñaceṣṭitāsamudācārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3183: nirantaraṃ sarvaprakāraduḥkhālambanakaruṇāvihārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
SA01asabhs_u:3187_1: asādhāraṇa karmasamudācārasamṛddhau asādhāraṇajñānavihārasamṛddhau ca yaḥ samādhiḥ
SA01asabhs_u:3189: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sarvākārajñatāsamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3191: viśuddhāni catvāri dhyānāni niśritya anyatīrthīyaḥ śrāvako bodhisattvo vā abhinirharati catvāri apramāṇānyevaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ /
SA01asabhs_u:3192: śeṣān guṇān prāntakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya śrāvako bodhisattvastathāgato vābhinirharati //
SA01asabhs_u:3197: ye svakāritrapratyupasthānāḥ te lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhāḥ saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvā draṣṭavyāḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3201: anukampāvihāritayā puṇya saṃbhāraṃ paripūrayati sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidyate //
SA01asabhs_u:3204: śubhanirmāṇe na saṃkliśyate śānteṣu vimokṣeṣu na sajjati /
SA01asabhs_u:3219: vākkarmaṇā cittādeśanayāvarjayati sattvacaritaṃ ca jñātvā āgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca niḥsaraṇe sattvān yathāvadavavadate //
SA01asabhs_u:3224: ākāṅkṣayankalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā tiṣṭhati āyuḥsaṃskārān vā utsṛjati /
SA01asabhs_u:3225: dharmavaśavarttī bhavati samādhivaśavartī saddharmaṃ ca sandhārayati //
SA01asabhs_u:3227_0: ahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratyākhāyākṛtābhyāgamavāde ca samyaga bhyudayamārgaṃ deśayati
SA01asabhs_u:3227_1: sattvacittacaritāni cānupraviśya deśanābhājanatāṃ cāśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ cālambanaṃ ca
SA01asabhs_u:3227_2: saṃbhāraṃ ca bhavyatāṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathāvanniḥśreyasamārgaṃ deśayati /
SA01asabhs_u:3228: sarvamārāṃśca nigṛṇhāti sarvatra ca praśnaṃ pṛcchati pṛṣṭo vyākaroti //
SA01asabhs_u:3239: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān kāyavāṅmanaskarmapariśuddhyā prāptyā cāreṇa vihāreṇa vābhibhavati //
SA01asabhs_u:3241: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasaṃśayāṃ śchinatti dharmanetrīñca dīrghakālamavasthāpayati yena paripakṣā (? kṣyāḥ)
SA01asabhs_u:3243: eṣvabhisamayeṣūttarottaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ labhamānaḥ pūrvakaṃ hīnaṃ mārgaṃ vijahāti saṃkalanaprahāṇaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti /
SA01asabhs_u:3244: nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau śrāvakaḥ sarvammārgasamavasargavihānyā vijahāti no tu bodhisattvaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3251: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvo bodhimanava vadyāmavakrāntaḥ strotāpanno na bhavati /
SA01asabhs_u:3257: bodhisattvaḥ satyānyabhi samayena labdhvā daśasu mūmiṣu bhāvanāmārgeṇa jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgaṃ bhāvayati na kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgam //
SA01asabhs_u:3258: tathā ca bodhiprāptaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca vijahāti arhan tathāgataśca saṃpadyate //
SA01asabhs_u:3259: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvakleśāprahāṇāt mantroṣadhayo viṣamiva sarvakleśān abhibhavati sarvān kleśān doṣāṃśca notpādayati sarvāsu bhūmiṣu arhanniva kleśān prajahāti /
SA01asabhs_u:3260_0: api khalu bodhisattvo jñeyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati upāyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati
SA01asabhs_u:3260_1: abhūtaparikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati nirvikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati tena kālena
SA01asabhs_u:3263: bhrāntiḥ bhrāntyāśrayaḥ abhrāntyāśrayaḥ bhrāntyabhrāntiḥ abhrāntiḥ abhrāntiniṣyandaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3271: abhāvavikalpa bhāvavikalpaḥ samāropavikalpaḥ apavādavikalpaḥ ekatvavi kalpaḥ pṛthaktvavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpaḥ viśeṣavikalpaḥ yathānāmārthavikalpaḥ yathārthanāmavikalpaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3276: yāsau nimittato niṣprapañcanirvikalpatā tasyāḥ punaḥ abhāvasya pañca nimittāni /
SA01asabhs_u:3277: na amanasikārataḥ na manasikārasamatikramataḥ na vyupaśamataḥ na svabhāvataḥ na ālambane 'bhisaṃskārataśca /
SA01asabhs_u:3279: bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ indriyāpyuttāpayatīti /
SA01asabhs_u:3286: arthaviniścayaḥ vyākhyāviniścayaḥ prabhidyasaṃdarśanaviniścayaḥ saṃpraśnaviniścayaḥ saṃgrahaviniścayaḥ vādaviniścayaḥ abhisandhiviniścayaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3290: svabhāvārthaḥ hetvarthaḥ phalārthaḥ karmārthaḥ yogārthaḥ vṛttyarthaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3295: vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ adhipatiphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3297: upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyāvasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3299: sāmūhiko yogaḥ ānubandhiko yogaḥ sāṃbandhiko yogaḥ āvasthiko yogaḥ vaikāriko yogaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3306: parijñeyavastu parijñeyo 'rthaḥ parijñopaniṣad parijñā parijñāphalam tatpravedanā ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3309_2: nayamukham parijñādimukham balā balamukham pratyāhāramukham abhinirhāramukhaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3311: yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacarakaḥ pūrvapadakaḥ paścātpadakaḥ dvikoṭikaḥ trikoṭikaḥ catuṣkoṭikaḥ oṃkāritaḥ prātikṣepika ityevamādayaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3323: vādaḥ vādādhikaraṇaṃ vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ bādālaṃkāraḥ vādanigrahaḥ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ bāde bahukarā dharmāśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3325: vādaḥ pravādaḥ vivādaḥ apavādaḥ anuvāda avavāśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3332: avavādaḥ sattvānāṃ asamāhitacittānāṃ cittasamādhānāya samāhitacittānāṃ vimokṣalābhāya deśanāvādaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3333: dvitīyaṃ vādādhikaraṇaṃ rājakulaṃ vā prajākulaṃ vā prāmāṇikānāṃ sahāyakānāṃ dharmārthakuśalānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ nādasabhā vā /
SA01asabhs_u:3341: pratijñā hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ anumānaṃ āptāgamaśca //
SA01asabhs_u:3345: hetuḥ tasminneva sādhye apratītasyārthasya saṃpratyayanimittaṃ pratyakṣopalambhānupalambhasamākhyānam //
SA01asabhs_u:3346: dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭa antena adṛṣṭāsya antasya samīkaraṇasamākhyānam //
SA01asabhs_u:3352: caturtho vādālaṃkāraḥ vādādhiṣṭhāne samyagyuktibhiḥ vādasabhāyāṃ gambhīro nipuṇaśca bhavatīti vādālaṃkāra ityucyate /
SA01asabhs_u:3354: svaparasamayajñatā vākkaraṇasaṃpad vaiśaradyaṃ pratibhānaṃ sthairyaṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3357: kathāsādaḥ anyavastupratisaraṇena vyāvṛttiḥ bāhyavastuvacanena mūlaparatijñāparityāgaḥ krodhamadamānamrākṣādi pradarśanaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3360: ākulaṃ saṃrabdham agamakam amitam anarthakam akālam asthiram apradīptam apravaddhaṃ ca //
SA01asabhs_u:3361: ṣaṣṭhaṃ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ guṇadoṣau vicārya vādānniḥsaratyakaraṇena vā prativādityabhājanatāṃ parṣado vaiguṇyamātmano 'kauśalyaṃ ca jñātvā vādaṃ na karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:3362: prativādini bhājanatāṃ parṣado guṇavattvamātmanaḥ kauśalyaṃ ca jñātvā vādaṃ karoti //
SA01asabhs_u:3365: svaparasamayajñatā yayā sarvatra nipuṇo vādaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:3366: vaiśāradyaṃ yena nipuṇaḥ samagraparṣadi vādaṃ karoti /
SA01asabhs_u:3367: pratimānaṃ yena nipuṇaḥ sarvāṃn kaṭhinān praśnān vyākaroti //
SA01asabhs_u:3368: api khalu svahitasukha kāmena vādeṣu abhijñātuṃ pravarttitavyaṃ na paraiḥ vivādaṃ kartum /
SA01asabhs_u:3370_2: samanupaśyatā na paraiḥ saha vivādaḥ kāryaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3377: asatpakṣabhiniveśadoṣaḥ kusṛtivacanadoṣaḥ akālikavākkaraṇadoṣaḥ kathāsādadoṣaḥ pārupyavacatadoṣaḥ cittāghātadoṣaśca /
SA01asabhs_u:3385: nirantaraṃ kuśaladharme 'bhāvite tu asamāhicittasya kṣipraṃ samādhilābhaḥ samāhitacittasya vā kṣipraṃ vimokṣalābho durlabhaḥ //
SA01asabhs_u:3391: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā rājānaṃ dvau bahuśrutau /
SA01asabhs_u:3392: rāṣṭraṃ sānucaraṃ hatvā naro viśuddha ucyate //
SA01asabhs_u:3399: api coktaṃ sūtre bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato dānapāra mitāyāṃ kṣipraṃ paripūriṃ labhate /
SA01asabhs_u:3407: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcadharmasamanvāgato brahmacārī bhavati parameṇa viśuddhena brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgataḥ //
